original_title: Changing Faces – The Best of Louise
overview: A greatest hits DVD of her singles whilst signed to EMI Records as a solo artist. Featuring the videos for Light of My Life, In Walked Love, Naked, Undivided Love, One Kiss from Heaven, Arms Around the World, Let's Go Round Again, All That Matters, 2 Faced, Beautiful Inside and Stuck in the Middle with You.
title: Changing Faces – The Best of Louise
